title: One-pot cheesy Italian sausage and rice with tomatoes recipe
directions: Heat a cast-iron skillet (or nonstick skillet) over medium-high heat.
Add the olive oil, sliced sausage, diced onion and tomatoes. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until the onions become translucent and the sausage starts to brown.
Add in the garlic, and cook for another 3 to 5 minutes, until the garlic starts to brown and is fragrant.
Add the instant brown rice and vegetable broth. Bring to a rapid boil, then reduce the heat to medium. Cover, and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until the broth is absorbed into the rice.
Stir the cheese into the rice and sausage just until it melts. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley, and serve warm.
ingredients: 1 small handful fresh chopped parsley, for garnish
